heading: Live loads posted
text:
Where the live loads for which each floor or portion thereof of a commercial or industrial building is or
has been designed to exceed 50 psf (2.40 kN/m2), a certificate of occupancy required by this article shall not be issued until such design
loads shall be conspicuously posted by the owner in that part of each story in which they apply, using durable signs. It shall be
unlawful to remove or deface such signs.
   Exception: This section 28-118.21 shall not apply to prior code buildings.
